answers.answer: It could affect his appetite and that will affect his sugars.  I would call hte doctor and ask them about it.

question: My son is a type 1 diabetic, and hes been on concerta 5 days. they said it will not affect his sugars but he has had high numbers since. Will concerta affect his sugars? I am also concerned about all the side affects ive been reading about
title: ADHD and diabetes
